word: THE SPIRIT OF PROPHECY COUNSELS EXALTED THE WORK OF THE LITERATURE EVANGELIST TO A PLACE IN THE DENOMINATION EQUAL TO THAT OF THE GOSPEL MINISTER. HUNDREDS OF PAGES OF COUNSEL POURED FORTH FROM HER PEN, PROVIDING IMPORTANT SALES INSTRUCTION AND INSPIRATION, NOT ALONE FOR THE COLPORTEUR BUT FOR THE PUBLISHING LEADERS AS WELL. (SEE COLPORTEUR MINISTRY.)
